txt.en: Congratulations! You are now allowed to enter Monster Play. You can access Monster Play from the character selection screen. To try it, log out of your character and click the 'Monster Play' button. Go, and unlock your true potential as a warrior in service to the Dark Lord!

Congratulations! You are now allowed to enter Monster Play. You can access Monster Play from the character selection screen. To try it, log out of your character and click the 'Monster Play' button. Go, and unlock your true potential as a warrior in service to the Dark Lord!
